amendment.description: Amendment sought to make $61,960,000 available for NextGen research and development.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to designate $61,960,000 shall be available for NextGen Research and Development.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings (FL) amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 116 - 295 (Roll no. 425).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hastings (FL) amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 116 - 295 (Roll no. 425).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Hastings (FL).
